cause.description:
This is to help introduce Cystic Fibrosis more to the world, everyone needs to know that CF is a life threatening disease and kills many people. My Goal is to help support other organizations in the steps towards fighting CF and finding a cure. As the Administrator of the cause I too am diagnosed with Cystic Fibrosis and am helping to fight the cause for my well being as well as all who suffer around the world.
"Don't Give Up You Can Make It Through" J.C. Desjardins
Please click this link and rate my poem!! http://www.poetry.com/voteforme/poemvote1.asp?PID=12347055
Also Come And Join My Cause "Cystic Fibrosis" This is a great cause that could help millions...It Starts With You!!!
1. Help Fight Cystic Fibrosis
2. It's Our Right To Live
3. Sixty-Five Roses
4. 65 Roses
5. Gaming4Cure
cause.name: Cystic Fibrosis
